00020 
00021 #ifndef CCN_SyncBase
00022 #define CCN_SyncBase
00023 
00024 #include <sys/types.h>
00025 #include <ccn/loglevels.h>
00026 #include <stdint.h>
00027 
00028 #include "sync_plumbing.h"
00029 
00030 // Incomplete types for opaque structures.
00031 struct ccn_schedule;
00032 struct ccn;
00033 struct SyncPrivate;
00034 
00035 // A SyncBase is the common data for a Sync Agent.  Each Sync Agent supports a
00036 // list of collections. 
00037 
00038 struct SyncBaseStruct {
00039     struct sync_plumbing *sd;   // interface between client and sync
00040     struct SyncErrStruct *errList;  // private data for Sync
00041     struct SyncPrivate *priv;       // opaque data for Repo (from Repo)
00042     int debug;                      // higher gives more output, 0 gives none
00043     unsigned lastRootId;            // last root id assigned (0 is not used)
00044 };
00045 
00046 // Error support
00047 
00048 enum SyncErrCode {
00049     SyncErrCode_none = 0,       // no error
00050     SyncErrCode_bug = 1,        // internal bug
00051     SyncErrCode_caller = 2      // caller error (bad args, wrong state, ...)
00052 };
00053 
00054 struct SyncErrStruct {
00055     struct SyncErrStruct *next;
00056     enum SyncErrCode code;
00057     char * file;
00058     int line;
00059 };
00060 
00061 
00062 // Logging support (veneer over sync_plumbing logging)
00063 void sync_msg(struct SyncBaseStruct *base, const char *fmt, ...);
00064 
00065 // add a new error record
00066 // this routine should be called from the SET_SYNC_ERR macro
00067 void SyncSetErrInner(struct SyncBaseStruct *base,
00068                      enum SyncErrCode code,
00069                      char * file, int line);
00070 
00071 // clear all the existing error records
00072 void SyncClearErr(struct SyncBaseStruct *base);
00073 
00074 // Basic object support
00075 
00076 // allocate a new sync base
00077 // and fill in the sync methods in sd
00078 struct SyncBaseStruct *
00079 SyncNewBase(struct sync_plumbing *sd);
00080 
00081 
00082 #endif
